tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Web search: General-purpose web search. Returns top results with relevant snippets.

queries.description: Array of search queries (max 5). Executed in parallel within one step. Cover different angles; avoid overlapping or near-duplicate queries.

tools.name: web_open_url
tools.description: Open URL: The `web_open_url` tool opens a specific URL and displays its content, allowing you to access and analyze web pages directly when users provide exact link(s).

tools.name: search_image_by_text
tools.description: Search images by text: Search images by text query. Returns matching images with titles, descriptions, and URLs.

queries.description: Search directly by queries. All queries will be searched in parallel.

download_dir.description: The directory to save the images, recommend to use absolute path

total_count.description: The number of images to return, default is 10

tools.name: search_image_by_image
tools.description: Search images by image: Search similar images by image URL. Returns matching images with titles, descriptions, and URLs.

image_url.description: The URL of the image to search based on, or the local absolute file path of the image

download_dir.description: The directory to save the images, recommend to use absolute path

total_count.description: The number of images to return, default is 10

tools.name: ipython
tools.description: Interactive Python execution environment for data analysis and visualization.

code.description: Python code to run in the IPython environment. Common data science packages are available. Variables and imports persist across executions. Use ! prefix for bash commands.

restart.description: Whether to restart the IPython environment. This will reset all variables and imports.

tools.name: get_data_source_desc
tools.description: Get datasource description and API details for financial/economic/academic data sources including yahoo_finance, arxiv, world_bank_open_data, stock_finance_data, google_scholar.

data_source_name.description: Name of the data source. Required parameter.

tools.name: get_data_source
tools.description: Get data from specific datasource API. Use get_data_source_desc first to see available APIs.

api_name.description: Name of the API to call

data_source_name.description: Name of the data source. Required parameter.

tools.name: memory_space_edits
tools.description: Manage contents stored in memory_space. Add, remove, or replace memory that persists across conversations.

operate.description: Which edit to perform: add | remove | replace.

content.description: Memory content. Required for operate=add|replace. Must be a complete declarative statement.

id.description: Target memory id. Required for operate=remove|replace.
